data.oai_dc:dc: Reproductive characteristics of hylid and leptodactylid frogs (Amphibia, Anura)

Data for 330 hylid and leptodactylid species included in Zamudio et al. 2016 (The American Naturalist) with references. Species in bold were used for non-phylogenetic analyses only. Blank cells represent missing data. Complete references in alphabetical order are given on the second sheet.
Phylogenetic comparative methods|Reproduction|Sexual selection|Multi-male spawning|Parental care
